mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_email, user_pw, user_nick, user_gender, user_preference, joined_at, user_type) VALUES (#{user_email}, MD5(#{user_pw}), #{user_nick}, #{user_gender}, #{user_preference}, now(), 'N');
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info WHERE user_email = #{user_email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info WHERE user_nick = #{user_nick}
select * from user_info where user_email = #{user_email} and user_pw = MD5(#{user_pw})
SELECT user_email FROM user_info WHERE user_nick = #{user_nick}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET user_pw = MD5(#{user_pw}) WHERE user_email = #{user_email}
